title: Leftover rice, steak and vegetable stir fry
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 green pepper, chopped', '1 beef steak fillet, cut into thin strips', '250g cooked brown rice', '2 tomatoes, peeled and chopped', '12 asparagus tips', '1 carrot, grated', '50g frozen peas', '1cm fresh ginger, peeled and finely chopped', '1 teaspoon Chinese five spice', '2 tablespoons soy sauce']
